Phase 2: Code Cleanup complete

Major improvements to code organization and quality:

1. Removed test comments from production code
   - Cleaned app/globals.css \(3 test comments\)
   - Cleaned app/page.jsx \(1 test comment\)

2. Deleted duplicate and unused files
   - Removed duplicate globals.css \(root\)
   - Removed empty animated-border.css
   - Removed test files \(TEST_BLOCK_REORDER.txt, TEST_DEPLOY.txt\)

3. Created shared utilities
   - lib/alienSound.js: Centralized audio effect function
   - lib/toast.js: Toast notification utility
   - components/Toast.jsx: Reusable toast component

4. Replaced all alert\(\) calls with toast notifications
   - Updated 6 components \(NewPostForm, EditableBlogPost, ImageUpload, 
     AvatarUploadWidget, blog/page, settings/page\)
   - Alien-themed toast design with icons and animations
   - Better UX with animated slide-in/out

5. Added helpful code comments
   - Documented complex renderContent\(\) function
   - Explained image parsing logic

Results:
- Cleaner codebase \(-4 files, +3 utility files\)
- Better user experience \(toasts vs alerts\)
- Reduced code duplication \(~80 lines saved\)
- More maintainable architecture

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
